RestartNeededBody: The configuration has been saved but not activated. Syncthing must restart to activate the new configuration.

URBody: The encrypted usage report is sent daily. It is used to track common platforms, repo sizes and app versions. If the reported data set is changed you will be prompted with this dialog again.
URLink: The aggregated statistics are publicly available at {{url}}
